using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
	const int maxh = 1e5;
	pair< ll, ll > a[maxh + 5];

int main()
{
    ll n,m,t,h,i,j,x,y;
	
    scanf("%lld", &t);
	while(t--)
	{

		scanf("%lld", &h);
		for (i = 0; i < h; ++i)
		{	
			scanf("%lld%lld",&x,&y );
			a[i].second=x;a[i].first=y;
		}
		sort(a, a + h);

		ll ans=1,st=a[0].second,ft=a[0].first;
		for ( i = 1; i < h; ++i)
		{
			x=a[i].second;y=a[i].first;
			
			if (x>ft)
			{
				ans++;
				ft=y;
			}

		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
    return 0;
}
